description: Securely retrieves environment variables or API keys (secrets) needed for various operations. Supports project-specific secrets using PROJECT__SECRET_NAME format. Access to sensitive secrets requires human approval. Less sensitive variables might be available without explicit approval, as defined by the system backend.

secret_name.description: The exact name of the environment variable or secret to retrieve (e.g., 'ANTHROPIC_API_KEY', 'DB_PASSWORD', 'DEFAULT_N8N_WEBHOOK_URL').

project_name.description: Optional project context. If provided, will first look for PROJECT__SECRET_NAME before falling back to global SECRET_NAME.

response_format: JSON containing the secret details. Example: {"secret_name": "ANTHROPIC_API_KEY", "value": "sk-abc123...", "status": "success", "source": "project"}

agent_specific_guidance.Planning Agent: Use this to retrieve API keys needed for planning external integrations.
agent_specific_guidance.Coder Agent: Request secrets when implementing API integrations. Always use the exact secret name.
agent_specific_guidance.Unit Tester Agent: Request test API keys or database credentials for integration tests.
agent_specific_guidance.n8n Flow Creator Agent: Request webhook URLs and API keys needed for automation workflows.
